tool.name: AWS Transcribe
tool.description: Transcribe speech to text via AWS Transcribe

param.name: audio_format
param.label: Audio Format
param.help: Format of the audio file. For best results use a lossless format such as FLAC or WAV with PCM 16-bit encoding.

param.name: s3_bucket
param.label: S3 Bucket Name
param.help: S3 bucket used for temporary storage of transcribe input/output files

param.name: s3_directory
param.label: S3 Directory Path
param.help: S3 directory inside S3 bucket for input files

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
Transcribe speech audio input to text output using Amazon Transcribe Web Service.
